original_text:
Legend of Cleopatra Megaways
Legend of Cleopatra Megaways è una slot machine prodotta dalla software house Playson che, nel corso degli anni, ha sfornato una miriade di titoli diventati dei cult nel mondo delle slot machine.
Legend of Cleopatra Megaways è un gioco che ha come tema l’Antico Egitto, in particolare la figura della regina Cleopatra. Lo sappiamo, non si tratta di certo di una tematica originale: le slot machine a tema egizio rappresentano negli ultimi anni quello che le Fruit Machine hanno rappresentato qualche decennio fa, e sono di certo tra le più diffuse.
Per quanto riguarda la grafica di questa slot di casa Playson, non ci troviamo davanti a un prodotto che ci lascia a bocca aperta: lo sfondo sia della schermata inziale che di quella di gioco è semplicemente rappresentata dall’immagine delle piramidi che si stagliano su un cielo notturno, e l’unica nota di colore è data dalla figura di cleopatra.
I rulli sono raffigurati come se fossero disegnati su un papiro, per il resto, non abbiamo nulla degno di nota.
Caratteristiche principali della slot machine
La slot machine Legend of Cleopatra Megaways sfrutta il Sistema di gioco chiamato appunto “Megaways”, che implica un enorme numero di modi per vincere, da 324 a ben 200.704.
Dal punto di vista della struttura della slot, si tratta di un gioco con una griglia costituita da 6 rulli e un numero di righe variabile da 2 a 8.
Il sistema di gioco Megaways, su concessione della Big Time Gaming che ne detiene i diritti, prevede combinazioni virtualmente illimitate di modi per vincere, il che rende ogni giro dei rulli un evento unico! Il numero esatto di possibili combinazioni vincenti viene determinato in modo casuale all’inizio di una sequenza di giri, inoltre, il gioco presenta un rullo extra nella parte superiore della schermata, che copre 4 posizioni, estendendosi dal rullo 2 al 5. Un piccolo display posto nell’angolo in alto a destra della finestra di gioco vi mostrerà in ogni momento il numero di Megaways attivi.
Il ritorno teorico al giocatore o RTP di Legend of Cleopatra Megaways si attesta su un 95,84%, nella media della maggior parte dei giochi di slot.
Simboli e funzionalità di Legend of Cleopatra Megaways
I simboli che potrete trovare sui rulli di Legend of Cleopatra Megaways comprendono, partendo da quelli con valore più basso, le carte da gioco dal 9 all’Asso, che assegnano da 0,5 a 0,75 volte la puntata per combinazioni di sei simboli.
Le icone tematiche sono invece quelle a tema egizio: abbiamo Anubi, Bastet, Horus e la stessa Cleopatra; questi simboli vi permetteranno di vincere premi fino a 40 volte il valore della vostra scommessa.
Una tessera di colore dorato, contrassegnata dalla scritta corrispondente, rappresenta il simbolo Wild, con funzione di jolly.
Non esiste simbolo Scatter in quanto il gioco utilizza un altro sistema di assegnazione dei giri gratuiti.

raw_translation.response:
Legend of Cleopatra Megaways

Legend of Cleopatra Megaways is a slot machine produced by the software house Playson, which over the years has created countless titles that have become cult classics in the world of slot machines. In this game, the theme is Ancient Egypt, more specifically, the figure of Queen Cleopatra. We know that this is not an original theme, as Egyptian-themed slot machines have become as popular in recent years as fruit machines were decades ago.

When it comes to the graphics of this Playson slot, we are not blown away: the background of both the initial and game screens is simply represented by the image of pyramids standing against a night sky. The only splash of color is from the figure of Cleopatra herself. The reels are depicted as if drawn on papyrus, but overall, there is nothing particularly noteworthy.

Main Features of the Slot Machine

The Legend of Cleopatra Megaways slot machine uses the game system called "Megaways," which implies a huge number of ways to win, ranging from 324 to an impressive 200,704. In terms of slot structure, it is a game with a grid consisting of 6 reels and a variable number of rows from 2 to 8.

The Megaways game system, under the concession of Big Time Gaming, who hold the rights to it, involves virtually unlimited combinations of ways to win, making every spin of the reels a unique event! The exact number of possible winning combinations is randomly determined at the beginning of a sequence of spins. Additionally, the game features an extra reel at the top of the screen, covering 4 positions and extending from reel 2 to 5. A small display located in the upper-right corner of the game window will show you at any time the number of active Megaways.

The theoretical return to player, or RTP of Legend of Cleopatra Megaways, is around 95.84%, which is on par with most slot games.

Symbols and Features of Legend of Cleopatra Megaways

The symbols you can find on the reels of Legend of Cleopatra Megaways include, starting from those with the lowest value, playing cards from 9 to Ace, which award from 0.5 to 0.75 times the bet for combinations of six symbols.

The thematic icons, on the other hand, are of Egyptian theme: we have Anubis, Bastet, Horus, and Cleopatra herself. These symbols will allow you to win prizes of up to 40 times the value of your bet. A golden card marked with the corresponding letter is the Wild symbol, which acts as a joker.

There is no Scatter symbol, as the game uses another system for assigning free spins.

message.content:
Legend of Cleopatra Megaways

Legend of Cleopatra Megaways is a slot machine produced by the software house Playson, which over the years has created countless titles that have become cult classics in the world of slot machines. In this game, the theme is Ancient Egypt, more specifically, the figure of Queen Cleopatra. We know that this is not an original theme, as Egyptian-themed slot machines have become as popular in recent years as fruit machines were decades ago.

When it comes to the graphics of this Playson slot, we are not blown away: the background of both the initial and game screens is simply represented by the image of pyramids standing against a night sky. The only splash of color is from the figure of Cleopatra herself. The reels are depicted as if drawn on papyrus, but overall, there is nothing particularly noteworthy.

Main Features of the Slot Machine

The Legend of Cleopatra Megaways slot machine uses the game system called "Megaways," which implies a huge number of ways to win, ranging from 324 to an impressive 200,704. In terms of slot structure, it is a game with a grid consisting of 6 reels and a variable number of rows from 2 to 8.

The Megaways game system, under the concession of Big Time Gaming, who hold the rights to it, involves virtually unlimited combinations of ways to win, making every spin of the reels a unique event! The exact number of possible winning combinations is randomly determined at the beginning of a sequence of spins. Additionally, the game features an extra reel at the top of the screen, covering 4 positions and extending from reel 2 to 5. A small display located in the upper-right corner of the game window will show you at any time the number of active Megaways.

The theoretical return to player, or RTP of Legend of Cleopatra Megaways, is around 95.84%, which is on par with most slot games.

Symbols and Features of Legend of Cleopatra Megaways

The symbols you can find on the reels of Legend of Cleopatra Megaways include, starting from those with the lowest value, playing cards from 9 to Ace, which award from 0.5 to 0.75 times the bet for combinations of six symbols.

The thematic icons, on the other hand, are of Egyptian theme: we have Anubis, Bastet, Horus, and Cleopatra herself. These symbols will allow you to win prizes of up to 40 times the value of your bet. A golden card marked with the corresponding letter is the Wild symbol, which acts as a joker.

There is no Scatter symbol, as the game uses another system for assigning free spins.

raw_translation.response:
Legend of Cleopatra Megaways is an online slot game developed by software company Playson. Over the years, Playson has released a plethora of titles that have become cult favorites in the world of slot machines.

This particular game is set in ancient Egypt, with the focus on the queen Cleopatra. Admittedly, this isn't an original theme - Egyptian-themed slots have become as ubiquitous as fruit machines in recent years. However, Legend of Cleopatra Megaways makes up for this with its impressive gameplay.

The graphics of this Playson slot game aren't particularly mind-blowing. The background of both the initial screen and the gameplay screen simply show the image of pyramids against a nighttime sky, with the only pop of color provided by the figure of Cleopatra. The reels are depicted as if drawn on a papyrus scroll, but otherwise there's nothing else notable about their appearance.

One of the key features of this slot machine is the Megaways gameplay system, which gives players a potentially massive number of ways to win - anywhere from 324 to 200,704 possible combinations, to be exact. The game grid consists of six reels and two to eight rows.

The Megaways system, which is licensed by Big Time Gaming, allows for virtually endless combinations of ways to win. This means that every spin of the reels is a unique event! The exact number of potential winning combinations is determined randomly at the start of a spin sequence, and there's an extra reel at the top of the gameplay screen that covers four positions, extending from reel 2 to 5. A small display in the top right corner of the gameplay window shows the number of active Megaways at any given time.

The theoretical Return to Player (RTP) rate of Legend of Cleopatra Megaways is around 95.84%, which falls within the average range for most slot games.

As for the symbols and features of Legend of Cleopatra Megaways, the symbols on the reels are familiar to anyone who has played Egyptian-themed slots before. The low-value symbols are the playing cards from nine to Ace, which pay out 0.5 to 0.75 times the bet for combinations of six symbols.

The thematic symbols, on the other hand, depict Egyptian icons such as Anubi, Bastet, Horus, and of course, Cleopatra herself. These symbols can reward players with prizes of up to 40 times the bet value.

The Wild symbol is a golden card marked with the word "Wild," which can serve as a wild card. Unlike many other slot games, there is no Scatter symbol - instead, the game uses a different system to trigger free spins.

message.content:
Legend of Cleopatra Megaways is an online slot game developed by software company Playson. Over the years, Playson has released a plethora of titles that have become cult favorites in the world of slot machines.

This particular game is set in ancient Egypt, with the focus on the queen Cleopatra. Admittedly, this isn't an original theme - Egyptian-themed slots have become as ubiquitous as fruit machines in recent years. However, Legend of Cleopatra Megaways makes up for this with its impressive gameplay.

The graphics of this Playson slot game aren't particularly mind-blowing. The background of both the initial screen and the gameplay screen simply show the image of pyramids against a nighttime sky, with the only pop of color provided by the figure of Cleopatra. The reels are depicted as if drawn on a papyrus scroll, but otherwise there's nothing else notable about their appearance.

One of the key features of this slot machine is the Megaways gameplay system, which gives players a potentially massive number of ways to win - anywhere from 324 to 200,704 possible combinations, to be exact. The game grid consists of six reels and two to eight rows.

The Megaways system, which is licensed by Big Time Gaming, allows for virtually endless combinations of ways to win. This means that every spin of the reels is a unique event! The exact number of potential winning combinations is determined randomly at the start of a spin sequence, and there's an extra reel at the top of the gameplay screen that covers four positions, extending from reel 2 to 5. A small display in the top right corner of the gameplay window shows the number of active Megaways at any given time.

The theoretical Return to Player (RTP) rate of Legend of Cleopatra Megaways is around 95.84%, which falls within the average range for most slot games.

As for the symbols and features of Legend of Cleopatra Megaways, the symbols on the reels are familiar to anyone who has played Egyptian-themed slots before. The low-value symbols are the playing cards from nine to Ace, which pay out 0.5 to 0.75 times the bet for combinations of six symbols.

The thematic symbols, on the other hand, depict Egyptian icons such as Anubi, Bastet, Horus, and of course, Cleopatra herself. These symbols can reward players with prizes of up to 40 times the bet value.

The Wild symbol is a golden card marked with the word "Wild," which can serve as a wild card. Unlike many other slot games, there is no Scatter symbol - instead, the game uses a different system to trigger free spins.

raw_translation_without_faq.response:
Legend of Cleopatra Megaways also has a Tumbling Reels feature, where winning symbols disappear and are replaced by new ones, potentially leading to additional wins. Additionally, landing four or more scatters in a single spin will trigger the game's free spins feature, with the number of free spins determined by the number of scatters on the reels.

Overall, Legend of Cleopatra Megaways may not have the most impressive graphics, but its Megaways gameplay system and potentially huge number of ways to win make it a standout among other Egyptian-themed slots.

response.headline: Megaways gameplay system
response.content: One of the key features of Legend of Cleopatra Megaways is the Megaways gameplay system, which offers an unprecedented number of ways to win. Players can potentially find themselves with combinations ranging from 324 to 200,704, determined randomly before each spin sequence. The grid itself is made up of six reels and up to eight rows, with an additional reel covering four positions from reel 2 to 5.

response.headline: Tumbling Reels feature
response.content: While there is no traditional cascading reels feature in Legend of Cleopatra Megaways, the game does offer Tumbling Reels. This means that after a winning combination is achieved, the symbols involved disappear, leaving gaps on the reels which are then replaced with new symbols that fall from above. If this results in a new winning combination, the process is repeated, potentially leading to multiple consecutive wins in a single spin.

response.headline: Free spins feature
response.content: Rather than using Scatter symbols to trigger free spins, Legend of Cleopatra Megaways uses a pyramid symbol. Players need to land at least four of these in order to activate the free spins feature, with the number of spins awarded increasing with the number of pyramids landed. During free spins, a multiplier is applied to any successive wins that occur thanks to the Tumbling Reels feature.

response.headline: Number of ways to win
response.content: With its Megaways system, Legend of Cleopatra Megaways offers players a potentially massive number of ways to win. The exact number is determined randomly before each spin sequence, but can range from 324 to 200,704. This, combined with the Tumbling Reels feature and the possibility of multiplying wins during free spins, can make for an exciting and lucrative gameplay experience.

response.headline: Graphics and theme
response.content: While the graphics of Legend of Cleopatra Megaways aren't particularly groundbreaking, they are fitting for the game's ancient Egyptian theme. The background showing the pyramids against a nighttime sky is atmospheric, and the reels themselves are depicted as if drawn on a papyrus scroll. The game's symbols, while familiar to fans of Egyptian-themed slots, are well-drawn and help to immerse players in the setting.

Review: Legend of Cleopatra Megaways is an online slot game developed by software company Playson. Over the years, Playson has released a plethora of titles that have become cult favorites in the world of slot machines.

This particular game is set in ancient Egypt, with the focus on the queen Cleopatra. Admittedly, this isn't an original theme - Egyptian-themed slots have become as ubiquitous as fruit machines in recent years. However, Legend of Cleopatra Megaways makes up for this with its impressive gameplay.

The graphics of this Playson slot game aren't particularly mind-blowing. The background of both the initial screen and the gameplay screen simply show the image of pyramids against a nighttime sky, with the only pop of color provided by the figure of Cleopatra. The reels are depicted as if drawn on a papyrus scroll, but otherwise there's nothing else notable about their appearance.

One of the key features of this slot machine is the Megaways gameplay system, which gives players a potentially massive number of ways to win - anywhere from 324 to 200,704 possible combinations, to be exact. The game grid consists of six reels and two to eight rows.

The Megaways system, which is licensed by Big Time Gaming, allows for virtually endless combinations of ways to win. This means that every spin of the reels is a unique event! The exact number of potential winning combinations is determined randomly at the start of a spin sequence, and there's an extra reel at the top of the gameplay screen that covers four positions, extending from reel 2 to 5. A small display in the top right corner of the gameplay window shows the number of active Megaways at any given time.

The theoretical Return to Player (RTP) rate of Legend of Cleopatra Megaways is around 95.84%, which falls within the average range for most slot games.

As for the symbols and features of Legend of Cleopatra Megaways, the symbols on the reels are familiar to anyone who has played Egyptian-themed slots before. The low-value symbols are the playing cards from nine to Ace, which pay out 0.5 to 0.75 times the bet for combinations of six symbols.

The thematic symbols, on the other hand, depict Egyptian icons such as Anubi, Bastet, Horus, and of course, Cleopatra herself. These symbols can reward players with prizes of up to 40 times the bet value.

The Wild symbol is a golden card marked with the word "Wild," which can serve as a wild card. Unlike many other slot games, there is no Scatter symbol - instead, the game uses a different system to trigger free spins.

With six reels and up to eight rows on the grid, PLUS an extra reel of four positions from the second to fifth, who wouldn't want to try their luck with this queen?

Review:
 
Megaways gameplay system

One of the key features of Legend of Cleopatra Megaways is the Megaways gameplay system, which offers an unprecedented number of ways to win. Players can potentially find themselves with combinations ranging from 324 to 200,704, determined randomly before each spin sequence. The grid itself is made up of six reels and up to eight rows, with an additional reel covering four positions from reel 2 to 5.

Tumbling Reels feature

While there is no traditional cascading reels feature in Legend of Cleopatra Megaways, the game does offer Tumbling Reels. This means that after a winning combination is achieved, the symbols involved disappear, leaving gaps on the reels which are then replaced with new symbols that fall from above. If this results in a new winning combination, the process is repeated, potentially leading to multiple consecutive wins in a single spin.

Free spins feature

Rather than using Scatter symbols to trigger free spins, Legend of Cleopatra Megaways uses a pyramid symbol. Players need to land at least four of these in order to activate the free spins feature, with the number of spins awarded increasing with the number of pyramids landed. During free spins, a multiplier is applied to any successive wins that occur thanks to the Tumbling Reels feature.

Number of ways to win

With its Megaways system, Legend of Cleopatra Megaways offers players a potentially massive number of ways to win. The exact number is determined randomly before each spin sequence, but can range from 324 to 200,704. This, combined with the Tumbling Reels feature and the possibility of multiplying wins during free spins, can make for an exciting and lucrative gameplay experience.

Graphics and theme

While the graphics of Legend of Cleopatra Megaways aren't particularly groundbreaking, they are fitting for the game's ancient Egyptian theme. The background showing the pyramids against a nighttime sky is atmospheric, and the reels themselves are depicted as if drawn on a papyrus scroll. The game's symbols, while familiar to fans of Egyptian-themed slots, are well-drawn and help to immerse players in the setting.

A small display in the top right corner of the gameplay window shows the number of active Megaways at any given time.

The theoretical Return to Player (RTP) rate of Legend of Cleopatra Megaways is around 95.84%, which falls within the average range for most slot games.

As for the symbols and features of Legend of Cleopatra Megaways, the symbols on the reels are familiar to anyone who has played Egyptian-themed slots before. The low-value symbols are the playing cards from nine to Ace, which pay out 0.5 to 0.75 times the bet for combinations of six symbols.

The thematic symbols, on the other hand, depict Egyptian icons such as Anubi, Bastet, Horus, and of course, Cleopatra herself. These symbols can reward players with prizes of up to 40 times the bet value.

The Wild symbol is a golden card marked with the word "Wild," which can serve as a wild card. Unlike many other slot games, there is no Scatter symbol - instead, the game uses a different system to trigger free spins.
